caption.title: Genome alignment and phylogenetic relationship of complete and closed reference strains of S. Typhimurium or used in this study.
caption.p: Sequence with >90% nucleotide sequence identity are indicated where this is direct alignment (green) or reverse and complement (red). The location of prophage sequence (red bars) or integrative elements (blue bars) are indicated. A maximum likelihood tree based on sequence variation (SNPs) in the core genome with reference to S. Typhimurium strain SL1344 (left) is annotated with the most likely order of acquisition (black arrow) or loss (red arrow) of prophage and integrative elements, based on the principle of parsimony.
